system.description:
Effect: All valid targets lose -1 ATK stage for 5 Activations.

The user may spend up to 6 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 15 per PP spent.

Requirement: User is a Dynamaxed Kinger and has a Water-Type attack on their Active List.

actions.name: G-Max Foam Burst
